title: Product Layout for Motorama/DragonOil
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Red, yellow and black markers; red, orange and white colored pencil; graphite on white tracing paper
description: Red oval in center of sheet with MOTORAMA in center; each letter numbered 1-8 in black. Oval outlined iin graphite. The word "Play" sketched above oval. Lower right, graphite rectangle w/ DRAGONOIL. The word "Dragon" in white. Lower right corner of sheet, a dragon's head in profile.
name: Drawing
